definition: Journey to the West, Ming dynasty novel by Wu Cheng'en 吳承恩|吴承恩, one of the Four Classic Novels of Chinese literature/also called Pilgrimage to the West or Monkey
west
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
to swim/variant of 遊|游[you2]
to walk/to tour/to roam/to travel
surname You
to record/to note/to memorize/to remember/mark/sign/classifier for blows, kicks, shots
one of three Ming dynasty sequels to Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记
one of three Ming dynasty sequels to Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记

sentences.english: The journey of the west consists has many characters, mostly mythical creatures.
sentences.chinese: 西游记包括许多章节，大部分虚构的生物。

sentences.english: It was said that the writer of Journey to the West was Qiu Chuji the originator of Quanzhen denomination.
sentences.chinese: 古传《西游记》是全真教龙门派开创者丘处机所撰。

sentences.english: This stour describes two characters from journey to the West.
sentences.chinese: 千里眼和顺风耳是《西游记》中的两个人物。

sentences.english: Journey to the West, Feng Mengbo Solo, Bund 3 Gallery, Shanghai, China.
sentences.chinese: 《西游记》冯梦波个展，沪申画廊，中国上海。

sentences.english: In the Chinese classic Journey to the West, who does Sun Wukong meet in his first challenge?
sentences.chinese: 在《西游记》里，孙悟空斩妖除魔的第一关遇到谁？

sentences.english: Jet:The movie is loosely based on the classic Chinese novel Journey to the West.
sentences.chinese: 这部电影是根据中国古典名著《西游记》改编的。

sentences.english: The author thinks the theme of Pilgrims to the west is Buddhist meditation.
sentences.chinese: 本文认为，《西游记》的主题是佛教的“禅门心法”。

sentences.english: Li Tian Wang was Nezha's father.
sentences.chinese: 我写西游记中的，李天王是哪吒的父亲。

sentences.english: I am planning to write a book, and I intend to entitle it The Journey Westward.
sentences.chinese: 我准备写一本书，打算将它命名为《西游记》。

sentences.english: The story is based on the earliest chapters of the classic story Journey to the West.
sentences.chinese: 故事改编于中国经典名著《西游记》的早期篇章。

sentences.english: The character, Tang Seng, is different from the real-life monk Xuanzang.
sentences.chinese: 《西游记》里的唐僧和真实的玄奘还是有区别的。

sentences.english: Acute response to market is the key of success for XYJ OL.
sentences.chinese: 敏锐的反应，是蓝港在线推广《西游记》成功的关键。

sentences.english: "Journey to the West" has been newly researched from the perspective of of "Dan Study".
sentences.chinese: 今本《西游记》的回目和结构显然与“丹经”有关。

definition: Monkey Wreaks Havoc in Heaven, story about the Monkey King Sun Wukong 孫悟空|孙悟空[Sun1 Wu4 kong1] from the novel Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记

Investiture of the Gods, major Ming dynasty vernacular novel of mythology and fantasy, very loosely based on King Wu of Zhou's 周武王[Zhou1 Wu3 wang2] overthrow of the Shang, subsequent material for opera, film, TV series, computer games etc
Wu Cheng'en (1500-1582), author (or compiler) of novel Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记
Sun Wukong, the Monkey King, character with supernatural powers in the novel Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 you2 Ji4]/Son Goku, the main character in Dragon Ball 七龍珠|七龙珠[Qi1 long2 zhu1]
Zhu Bajie, character in Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记, with pig-like characteristics and armed with a muckrake/Pigsy in Arthur Waley's translation
Xuanzang (602-664) Tang dynasty Buddhist monk and translator, who traveled to India 629-645
supernatural novel/novel of ghosts and goblins

the Four Classic Novels of Chinese literature, namely: A Dream of Red Mansions 紅樓夢|红楼梦[Hong2 lou2 Meng4], Romance of Three Kingdoms 三國演義|三国演义[San1 guo2 Yan3 yi4], Water Margin 水滸傳|水浒传[Shui3 hu3 Zhuan4], Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 you2 Ji4]
Sha Wujing
Tripitaka (602-664), Tang dynasty Buddhist monk and translator who traveled to India 629-645/same as 玄奘
original work (not translation or abridged)
one of three Ming dynasty sequels to Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记
Water Margin or Outlaws of the Marsh by Shi Nai'an 施耐庵[Shi1 Nai4 an1], one of the Four Classic Novels of Chinese literature
Erlangshen, Chinese deity
Great-Sage Sun/Sun Wukong 孫悟空|孙悟空[Sun1 Wu4 kong1]
Jigong or Daoji (1130-1207), Southern Song Dynasty Buddhist monk
